Class JobQue

public class JobQue
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Niclas A class that works lika a scheduler for Runnable objects

Method Detail

addJob

public java.lang.Integer addJob(java.lang.Runnable job,
                                long time)
Add a new job to the scheduler

Parameters:
job: - The Runnable object thats run method should be invoked
time: - How often the job should be done. The time are in milliseconds
Returns:
The id of the job.

pauseJob

public void pauseJob(java.lang.Integer id)
Pauses a job.

Parameters:
id: - The id of the job

resumeJob

public void resumeJob(java.lang.Integer id)
Resume a job if it have been paused. The job will be executed first after the time paired with the job

Parameters:
id: - The id of the job

removeJob

public void removeJob(java.lang.Integer id)
Completely removes the job

Parameters:
id - The id of the job

changeTime

public void changeTime(java.lang.Integer id,
                       long time)
Change the time of the job. The change will occur after the next executon of the job

Parameters:
id: - The id of the job
time: - How many milliseconds it should be between jobs

runOnce

public void runOnce(java.lang.Runnable job,
                    long time)
Run a job once after the given time

Parameters:
job: - The job that should be executed
time: - After how many milliseconds the job should be executed

runImmediately

public void runImmediately(java.lang.Runnable job)
Runs the job immediately

Parameters:
job: - The job to run

isRunning

public boolean isRunning(java.lang.Integer id)
Test if a job is running

Parameters:
id: - The id of the job
Returns:

jobExists

public boolean jobExists(java.lang.Integer id)
Test if there exist a job with the given id

Parameters:
id: - The id of the job
Returns:
True if the job exists and aren't dying
